content.raw: Hi Steven  and Martin, I figured how to use the cone model, but the result is still a bit less than perfect. Is it necessary to do the fix from Andrea (the first post)? If so, where is that fix implemented? I googled and found that piece in ODEPhysics.cc, but I couldn't find that file though...
